column2: If a Chinese Imperial China is usurped from within by another dynasty eligible for Chinese Imperial vassals might break off, and could potentially even claim the Mandate of Heaven.
Nothing special happens if a Chinese Imperial China is usurped from within by another dynasty eligible for Chinese Imperial.
Female relatives of a Chinese Imperial Emperor of China can be married normally. The "Request Imperial Marriage" interactions are disnabled.
Female relatives of a Chinese Imperial Emperor of China cannot be married normally. The "Request Imperial Marriage" interactions are enabled.
Chinese Imperial rulers' Mandate of Heaven ratings shift at an average rate.
Chinese Imperial rulers' Mandate of Heaven ratings can shift fairly rapidly severely.
Chinese Imperial rulers' Mandate of Heaven ratings shifts less rapidly.
Members of the Treasure Fleet might attempt to found empires through war.
No member of the Treasure Fleet can attempt to found an empire through war.
Only the player can attempt to found an empire through war as a Treasure Fleet member.
The dragons that can show up during the Lunar New Year celebration if supernatural events are enabled will not always be from the Far East.
The dragons that can show up during the Lunar New Year celebration if supernatural events are enabled will exclusively be from the Far East.
Rulers with access to the Indian Subjugation casus belli can target fellow Dharmics belonging to the same culture group.
Rulers with access to the Indian Subjugation casus belli can target co-religionists belonging to the same culture group.
Rulers with access to the Indian Subjugation casus belli can target fellow Dharmics belonging to the same culture and co-religionists belonging to the same culture group.
Rulers with access to the Indian Subjugation casus belli can target fellow Dharmics belonging to the same culture.
There is no range restriction for the Indian Subjugation casus belli.
Only bordering realms and realms within two sea zones of the attacker's realm can be targeted with the Indian Subjugation casus belli.
Both the player and the AI can prepare and launch Rising Sun Subjugations
It is impossible to prepare or launch Rising Sun Subjugations
Only the player can prepare and launch Rising Sun Subjugations
Wars of Honor can be waged against other independent realms and vassals of the same liege
Wars of Honor can only be waged against rulers with the liege
Rulers eligible to declare holy wars can always wage them against targets up to two sea zones away.
Christians and Muslims have restrictions on their overseas holy wars prior to the Crusades/Jihads becoming active.
Overseas holy wars require certain technological advancements to unlock.
Historical interesting Muslim courtiers can spawn.
Historical interesting Muslim courtiers will not spawn.
The Seljuk (prior to year 1200) and Timurid dynasties have access to the Manifest Destiny Invasion casus belli.
The Manifest Destiny Invasion is not available.
Nomads can use the Nomad Subjugation casus belli.
The Nomad Subjugation casus belli is unavailable
Pagan Moral Authority is not increased
Pagan religions with at least one ruler or province start with ten stacks of the "The Old Ways Are Strong" modifier, which disappear at a rate of one stack every ten years.
Pagan religions with at least one ruler or province start with ten stacks of the "The Old Ways Are Strong" modifier, which disappear at a rate of one stack every twenty years.
Pagan religions with at least one ruler or province start with ten stacks of the "The Old Ways Are Strong" modifier, which last indefinitely.
Pagan religions with at least one ruler or province start with twenty stacks of the "The Old Ways Are Strong" modifier, which disappear at a rate of one stack every ten years.
Pagan religions with at least one ruler or province start with twenty stacks of the "The Old Ways Are Strong" modifier, which disappear at a rate of one stack every twenty years.
Pagan religions with at least one ruler or province start with twenty stacks of the "The Old Ways Are Strong" modifier, which last indefinitely.
Non-nomadic pagans can use the Pagan County Conquest casus belli unless eligible for a Chinese or Japanese government type.

Non-nomadic non-Peaceful pagans can use the Pagan County Conquest casus belli if unreformed and ineligible for the Chinese and Japanese government types, Warmongering, belonging to an offensive religion, or reformed with a Doctrine that explicitly unlocks overseas Pagan County Conquests.

Non-nomadic non-Peaceful pagans can use the Pagan County Conquest casus belli if Warmongering, belonging to an offensive religion, or reformed with a Doctrine that explicitly unlocks overseas Pagan County Conquests.
Only Germanic pagans and reformed religions with a Doctrine that explicitly unlocks overseas Pagan County Conquests can use the casus belli against overseas targets.
Non-nomads able to use the Pagan County Conquest casus belli can use it against overseas targets if belonging to a seafaring culture or religion.
Pagans with access to the Pagan Subjugation casus belli can use the casus belli against any pagan that is either unreformed or follow the reformed version of the attacker's religion.
The Pagan Subjugation casus belli can only be used against co-religionists.
The Pagan Subjugation casus belli can only be used against rulers belonging to the same culture and co-religionists belonging to the same culture group.
The Pagan Subjugation casus belli can only be used against rulers belonging to the same culture.
There is no range restriction on the Pagan Subjugation casus belli.
Only bordering realms and realms within two sea zones of the attacker's realm can be targeted with the Pagan Subjugation casus belli.
Pagan Great Holy Wars can only be started after the start of either the Crusades or the Jihads.
Reformed pagan religion heads following a religion with access to Great Holy Wars have access to a decision to unlock them.
Unreformed pagan tribals may not switch to a feudal government or become a merchant republic.
Unreformed pagan tribals may switch to a feudal government or become a merchant republic with sufficient technology.
Unreformed pagan tribals may switch ot a feudal government or become a merchant republic as easily as other religions.
The "The Three Mountains" doctrine is allowed when reforming the Ryukyuan religion, and the AI is very likely to choose it.
The "The Three Mountains" doctrine, focusing on world conquest, cannot be selected when reforming the Ryukyuan religion.
The AI is not allowed to select the "The Three Mountains" when reforming the Ryukyuan religion.
The more historical Ryukyuan doctrine is not allowed to be chosen, the "The Three Mountains" doctrine is allowed, and the AI is very likely to choose it.
The Inca Invasion will occur at a random date, though at the earliest at the year 1000, and 50 years after the game has started.
The Inca Invasion will occur at the very earliest in the 13th century.
The Inca Invasion will not occur.
The Inca Invasion will occur at a random date, though at the earliest 50 years after that game is started.
The Aztec and Inca invaders do not start with a boost to their Moral Authority.
The Aztec and Inca invaders will start with a major boost to their Moral Authority.
